Package index

All functions

add_cluster_info()
Add dataframe columns detailing ordering and groups from a dendrogram
colScaleM() rowScaleM() geomScaleM()
Efficient column and row scaling for sparse matrices
cosine_sim()
Efficient calculation of cosine similarity for sparse or dense matrices
dataset_names()
Return dataset names either all or those matching a query
id2char()
Convert any id into a character vector
partner_summary2adjacency_matrix()
Convert a partner summary table into an adjacency matrix
prepare_cosine_matrix()
Cosine matrix utility functions
register_dataset()
Register a dataset for use with coconat and related packages
